data: [{"id":"ab5ef103-93c9-40b4-9ede-2a7369ff5147","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":1,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: flatten","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c5024fb0-76eb-4225-8fbc-44f6b16a3de7","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description:\n","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Flattens nested data structures into a single-level list or collection. Simplifies complex hierarchical information for easier processing.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e9d71f7a-1755-463b-8aa1-e15275008dbe","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Implementation Details:\n","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"flatten","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method takes a single argument ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"a","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". It checks if ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"a","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a list.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a16fc9db-ae27-4f0c-afc1-1bebc4abf42f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"a","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is not a list, it wraps the item in a single-element list and returns it (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"[a]","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"30a0f6f6-9e4f-4668-a3b0-1fa9b7e8d3c3","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"a","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a list, it recursively iterates through every item in ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"a","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"flatten","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" on each item, and concatenates the results into a new list ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"b","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This ensures that arbitrarily deep nested lists are reduced to a single, flat list containing all non-list elements.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8f0ee3c5-9221-4bdf-ad9a-53f12891d861","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]},{"id":"57cce49d-f5af-4ae2-a2be-2cbfecdb6744","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
